snippet.title: Bip Bop (1993, MS-DOS) - Full Longplay [720p60]
snippet.description:
You Are A Master Bip-Bopper(?)!

Special shoutout to Accursed Farms for making the full series accessible to everyone.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R-JAICJ0k4Q

A bit like poor-man's version of Arkanoid, you have to fire the little pixel ball through the hole at the top to progress.

Simple enough in principle, but the catch is that the paddle is constantly in motion. Have fun trying to time it right with the tiny ball.
Also occasionally the ball can "clip" the paddle/edge and cause some awkward bounces

10 Levels in total. 
————————————————————————————
Bip Bop 1 — You are here
Bip Bop 2 — https://youtu.be/HNsGJthNEYg
Bip Bop 3 — https://youtu.be/HeEBHLedkdo
————————————————————————————
See my other PC/DOS gameplays here
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLnK-0g_LLzdxffzq-PaJnxngcB160bchQ

See my other gameplays here
http://www.youtube.com/user/RubycoredBejeweled/videos?view=1&flow=grid
————————————————————————————
